order_confirmation.name: Order Confirmation
order_confirmation.description: SMS notification sent when order is confirmed
order_confirmation.template: Hi {{customer_name}}, your order #{{order_number}} for ${{total_amount}} has been confirmed! Estimated delivery: {{estimated_delivery}}. Track at autoselect.com/track/{{order_number}}

order_shipped.name: Order Shipped
order_shipped.description: SMS notification sent when order is shipped
order_shipped.template: Great news {{customer_name}}! Your order #{{order_number}} has shipped via {{carrier}}. Tracking: {{tracking_number}}. Track at autoselect.com/track/{{order_number}}

order_in_transit.name: Order In Transit
order_in_transit.description: SMS notification sent when order is in transit
order_in_transit.template: Hi {{customer_name}}, your order #{{order_number}} is on its way! Expected delivery: {{estimated_delivery}}. Track at autoselect.com/track/{{order_number}}

order_out_for_delivery.name: Out for Delivery
order_out_for_delivery.description: SMS notification sent when order is out for delivery
order_out_for_delivery.template: {{customer_name}}, your order #{{order_number}} is out for delivery today! Delivery window: {{delivery_window}}. Track at autoselect.com/track/{{order_number}}

order_delivered.name: Order Delivered
order_delivered.description: SMS notification sent when order is delivered
order_delivered.template: Your order #{{order_number}} was delivered at {{delivery_time}}! Thank you for choosing AutoSelect, {{customer_name}}. Need help? Reply SUPPORT

order_delayed.name: Order Delayed
order_delayed.description: SMS notification sent when order is delayed
order_delayed.template: Hi {{customer_name}}, order #{{order_number}} is delayed due to {{reason}}. New estimated delivery: {{new_estimated_delivery}}. We apologize for the inconvenience.

order_cancelled.name: Order Cancelled
order_cancelled.description: SMS notification sent when order is cancelled
order_cancelled.template: {{customer_name}}, order #{{order_number}} has been cancelled. Refund of ${{refund_amount}} will be processed within {{refund_timeline}}. Questions? Reply HELP

payment_processing.name: Payment Processing
payment_processing.description: SMS notification sent when payment is being processed
payment_processing.template: Hi {{customer_name}}, we're processing your payment of ${{amount}} for order #{{order_number}}. You'll receive confirmation shortly.

payment_failed.name: Payment Failed
payment_failed.description: SMS notification sent when payment fails
payment_failed.template: {{customer_name}}, payment of ${{amount}} for order #{{order_number}} failed. Please update payment method at autoselect.com/orders/{{order_number}}

payment_refunded.name: Payment Refunded
payment_refunded.description: SMS notification sent when payment is refunded
payment_refunded.template: {{customer_name}}, refund of ${{refund_amount}} for order #{{order_number}} has been initiated. Expect funds within {{refund_timeline}}.

order_ready_for_pickup.name: Ready for Pickup
order_ready_for_pickup.description: SMS notification sent when order is ready for pickup
order_ready_for_pickup.template: {{customer_name}}, order #{{order_number}} is ready for pickup at {{pickup_location}}! Hours: {{pickup_hours}}. Bring your ID and order confirmation.

delivery_attempt_failed.name: Delivery Attempt Failed
delivery_attempt_failed.description: SMS notification sent when delivery attempt fails
delivery_attempt_failed.template: {{customer_name}}, delivery attempt for order #{{order_number}} failed. Next attempt: {{next_attempt_date}}. Update delivery preferences at autoselect.com/track/{{order_number}}

order_status_update.name: Order Status Update
order_status_update.description: Generic SMS notification for order status changes
order_status_update.template: Hi {{customer_name}}, order #{{order_number}} status: {{status}}. {{status_message}} Track at autoselect.com/track/{{order_number}}

quality_check_complete.name: Quality Check Complete
quality_check_complete.description: SMS notification sent when quality check is complete
quality_check_complete.template: {{customer_name}}, your vehicle for order #{{order_number}} has passed quality inspection and is ready for shipment! Estimated delivery coming soon.

production_started.name: Production Started
production_started.description: SMS notification sent when vehicle production starts
production_started.template: Great news {{customer_name}}! Production has started on your order #{{order_number}}. Estimated completion: {{estimated_completion}}.
